name: SEO Company Limited

overview:
Founded in 2005 as a full digital marketing services agency for Organic SEO & PPC Campaign management and Web development company. SEO Company Limited specialises in search engine optimisation (SEO), pay per click (PPC), application development, web design and consulting services. SEO Company Limited has become one of the Internet marketing sector’s best-known and most respected optimisation companies.

Our basic aim is to satisfy our clients by providing them the best solutions beyond their expectations. To add value to businesses and lives we touch by creating a workplace environment where we consistently improve our knowledge and innovative processes to deliver higher value to our customers.

We are the High Performance search engine marketing agency and SEO/SEM Services. SEO Companylimited is the largest independent search engine marketing agency specialising in all SEM disciplines including search engine optimisation, pay per click management, SEM services, links building services, Web design, Website marketing consultancy and search marketing technology.

Using both natural search and paid search, SEO Companylimited helps clients dramatically increase profits and sales, through better visibility and cost efficiency, in paid and natural search results.

SEO Companylimited has a dedicated Research & Development division responsible for creating proprietary technologies.

We are performance consultants in PPC, SEM, SEO and affiliate marketing, with a proud record of delivering superior returns through more advanced technology and more experienced consultants. We work in partnership with in-house teams providing bespoke solutions to take search marketing to the next level.

We also work with clients who wish to fully outsource their search marketing but are looking for more proactivity and better results than their existing agency partners provide.
